text: Nicholas Nicholie "Nick" Koback (July 19, 1935 â€“ January 23, 2015) was a Polish-American professional baseball player. His career spanned eight seasons, three of which were spent with the Major League Baseball (MLB) Pittsburgh Pirates from 1953 through 1955. Koback died January 23, 2015 in Hartford, Connecticut, aged 79. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players Category:Sportspeople from Hartford, Connecticut
title: Nick Koback
